name: Museum of Modern Art
description: The Museum of Modern Art in New York City

artworks.title: The Starry Night
artworks.description: The Starry Night is an oil-on-canvas painting by Dutch Post-Impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh. Painted in June 1889, it depicts the view from the east-facing window of his asylum room at Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, just before sunrise, with the addition of an imaginary village.

curator_notes.note: This painting was created during van Gogh's stay at the asylum in Saint-Rémy-de-Provence.
curator_notes.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson
